doc:
Ken Shorter https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ken_Shorter 0 Ken Shorter (born 1945) is an Australian actor best known for playing the title role in the biker film Stone (1974), and You Can't See 'round Corners (1969). In an iconic scene his character puts his arm up Rowena Wallace's skirt.Television appearances include Skippy, Play School, Matlock Police, Division 4, G.P., Casualty and The Bill. Films include Ned Kelly and Sunday Too Far Away, and the Disney film Dragonslayer (1981). Ken_Shorter ( born 1945 ) is an_Australian_actor best_known for playing the_title_role in the_biker_film_Stone ( 1974 ) , and You Ca_n't_See ' round_Corners ( 1969 ) . In an_iconic_scene his_character puts his_arm up Rowena_Wallace 's_skirt.Television_appearances include Skippy , Play_School , Matlock_Police , Division_4 , G.P. , Casualty and The_Bill . Films include Ned_Kelly_and_Sunday_Too_Far Away , and the_Disney_film_Dragonslayer ( 1981_) .
